original_text: When Jephthah returned to his home in Mizpah, who should come out to meet him but his daughter, dancing to the sound of timbrels! She was an only child. Except for her he had neither son nor daughter.
korean_text: 입다가 미스바에 있는 자기 집에 이를 때에 보라 그의 딸이 소고를 잡고 춤추며 나와서 영접하니 이는 그의 무남독녀라

sentences.original_text: When Jephthah returned to his home in Mizpah
sentences.korean_translation: 입다가 미스바에 있는 그의 집으로 돌아왔을 때

sentences.original_text: who should come out to meet him
dancing to the sound of timbrels
he had neither son nor daughter
